org.treetank.cache

Class LRUCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.cache.LRUCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICache

    public final class LRUCache
extends Object
implements ICache
    An LRU cache, based on LinkedHashMap. This cache can hold an possible second cache as a second layer for example for storing data in a persistent way.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LRUCache()
      Constructor with no second cache.
      LRUCache(ICache paramSecondCache)
      Creates a new LRU cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the cache.
      NodePageContainer get(long mKey)
      Retrieves an entry from the cache.
      The retrieved entry becomes the MRU (most recently used) entry.
      Collection<Map.Entry<Long,NodePageContainer>> getAll()
      Returns a Collection that contains a copy of all cache entries.
      void put(long mKey, NodePageContainer mValue)
      Adds an entry to this cache.
      String toString()
      int usedEntries()
      Returns the number of used entries in the cache.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LRUCache

        public LRUCache(ICache paramSecondCache)
        Creates a new LRU cache.
        Parameters:
        paramSecondCache - the reference to the second cache where the data is stored when it gets removed from the first one.

      • LRUCache

        public LRUCache()
        Constructor with no second cache.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public NodePageContainer get(long mKey)
        Retrieves an entry from the cache.
        The retrieved entry becomes the MRU (most recently used) entry.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ICache
        Parameters:
        mKey - the key whose associated value is to be returned.
        Returns:
        the value associated to this key, or null if no value with this key exists in the cache.

      • put

        public void put(long mKey,
       NodePageContainer mValue)
        Adds an entry to this cache. If the cache is full, the LRU (least recently used) entry is dropped.
        Specified by:
        put in interface ICache
        Parameters:
        mKey - the key with which the specified value is to be associated.
        mValue - a value to be associated with the specified key.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the cache.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface ICache

      • usedEntries

        public int usedEntries()
        Returns the number of used entries in the cache.
        Returns:
        the number of entries currently in the cache.

      • getAll

        public Collection<Map.Entry<Long,NodePageContainer>> getAll()
        Returns a Collection that contains a copy of all cache entries.
        Returns:
        a Collection with a copy of the cache content.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
